title: Linux dd Command with Practical Examples

verify.name: Verify USB drive backup
verify.hint: Please ensure you have created a backup image of the USB drive in the `~/project/usb_backup.img` file, and that the backup image is valid by checking the first block of the USB drive.

steps.title: Restore a Backup Image to a USB Drive

verify.name: Verify USB drive restoration
verify.hint: Please ensure you have restored the backup image to the USB drive correctly. The verification checks the first block of the USB drive and compares the backup image file with the restored data on the USB drive.
